<a id="GLTFTexture"></a>

# GLTFTexture

**Inherits:** [Resource](Resource.md) **\<** [RefCounted](RefCounted.md) **\<** [Object](Object.md)

GLTFTexture represents a texture in a glTF file.

<!-- classref-introduction-group -->

## Tutorials

- [Runtime file loading and saving](../tutorials/io/runtime_file_loading_and_saving.md)

<!-- classref-descriptions-group -->

## Property Descriptions

<a id="GLTFTexture_property_sampler"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[int](int.md) **sampler** = `-1` [ðŸ”—](#GLTFTexture_property_sampler)

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

- `void` **set_sampler**\ (\ value\: [int](int.md)\ )
- [int](int.md) **get_sampler**\ (\ )

ID of the texture sampler to use when sampling the image. If -1, then the default texture sampler is used (linear filtering, and repeat wrapping in both axes).

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="GLTFTexture_property_src_image"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[int](int.md) **src_image** = `-1` [ðŸ”—](#GLTFTexture_property_src_image)

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

- `void` **set_src_image**\ (\ value\: [int](int.md)\ )
- [int](int.md) **get_src_image**\ (\ )

The index of the image associated with this texture, see [GLTFState.get_images()](GLTFState.md#GLTFState_method_get_images). If -1, then this texture does not have an image assigned.
